settings.label: Enable styled tables
settings.info: This will add borders and padding to your tables

settings.label: Enable solid menu background color
settings.info: This will enable a solid header over the banner images

settings.label: Enable menu background transparency
settings.info: This will make the sticky menu semi-transparent throughout the shop

settings.label: Inventory remaining threshold
settings.info: Inventory remaining text will be displayed below this value

settings.content: After enabling reviews you will need to install the free [Shopify Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app.

settings.label: Display star rating on product listings
Display star rating on product page
Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: USD CAD INR GBP AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.label: Show newsletter form above footer
settings.info: Home page newsletter can be added as a section.
